slogan: The bot you didn't know you
shortdesc: Get livestream notifications, moderate your server, use custom commands and triggers to make the impossible possible, and a lot more.
section1_desc1: Hope is a powerful bot to make your server attractive, fun, and moderate.
section1_desc2: Hope includes a powerful and vast moderation system that helps you control and keep everything in order on your server. Say goodbye to trolls, say goodbye to spammers, say goodbye to pervates with Hope's automatic moderation system!
section1_desc3: This isn't all Hope can offer you. Hope also manages to announce new broadcasts on Twitch and Youtube (Live and Videos), as well as subreddit posts on Reddit. Make your server an attractive place with Hope!
section1_desc4: Do you think that's all? No! Hope is also able to announce birthdays of the day on a specific channel with its Birthdays addon.
section1_desc5: Oh! How about an advanced suggestion system? Of course Hope has one! Allow members of your server to leave suggestions and vote for a specific channel with Hope.
section1_desc6: It's a lot of good stuff, right? Did I mention the advanced Ticket system? Well, I guess I better stop here and let you find out all this for yourself, right?
section2_desc4: Sign up for a monthly plan to experience the benefits of Hope's premium features.
section2_desc8: With the lifetime plan, you can enjoy Hope's premium features forever, for one single affordable price.
section2_desc12: Enjoy a full year for one promotional price and take advantage of Hope's premium features.
section2_desc14: and check out all the premium benefits you can unlock.
section3_desc4: Our easy to use dashboard includes all of our Hope's configuration in one centralized place.
section3_desc6: Take control of your guild! Hope Bot makes it very simple to give your server the attention to detail it needs.
section3_desc8: Hope's Auto Moderation System is ideal for small, and large servers! With our easy to use panel, you can protect and moderate your server without the need for any commands!
section3_desc10: Hope Bot has a very nicely designed music section focused on quality. You can play music in your guild without interuptions, or issues with quality.
section3_desc12: Every interation with Hope is made with easy, to help the user easily and efficiently preform their daily server duties.
section3_desc14: DawnForge maintains Hope Bot, and is very eager to help you with any questions or feedback you may have!
section4_desc1: Letting your fans know you've submitted something new is boring and tiresome.... You want to use your time to be productive and make bigger and better content for your fans but much of the time is spent just reminding your fans that new content is out, as some social networks think they know more about what their fans like and want to receive than their own fans do...
section4_desc2: Avoid such problems, I myself will check your YouTube channel, Twitch channel, Twitter, RSS feeds and various other places to see if you have made anything new! Focus on your progress, I'll take care of the notifying your fans part.
section6_desc1: Automatically protect your server against trolls, spam, mass mentions, and give your mods the best tools to moderate!
section7_desc8: It may take some time to appear on the above service(s).
section7_desc9: Format: TV ‚Ä¢ Duration: 24 minutes ‚Ä¢ Studio: Toei Animation
section7_desc11: Are you an anime fan? one moment... What? A BIG ANIME FAN? should I say, an otaku? So you can be happy that Hope can notify you whenever your favorite anime of the season has its episode aired, automatically and in real time.
section7_desc12: All right... and if you still have doubts about where to watch the episode, just relax, Hope lists all the official places you can watch it. You liked it, huh?
section9_desc3: Wish user's birthdays in a pre-defined channel.
section9_desc5: Allow members to offer suggestions on a specific channel.
section9_desc7: Addon allowing your users to create tickets on your server.
section9_desc9: Allow members to self-assign roles by reacting.
section10_desc3: You can relay on our amazing features list and also our customer services will be great experience for you without doubt
footer_desc: The best Discord bot to bootstrap and grow your Discord server
pb_2: A quality, well-made listing service that offers users a completely fair and unbiased list of servers for you to explore and join!
contact_4: Have any questions? We'd love to hear from you.

premium_4: Upgrading to Hope Premium help support the development and operation of HOPE‚Äôs, as well as providing you unlock the full potential of your server by getting unrestricted access to all HOPE‚Äôs features and plugins.

helpercenter3: See if our main articles, or our FAQ section can help you, otherwise feel free to seek help at
helpercenter6: Are you lost? See where to start after adding Hope to your server
helpercenter8: Learn how to add your favorite anime to the watchlist on your server
helpercenter10: Learn how to buy premium and redeem it on your server
helpercenter12: Learn how to protect your server against raiders and trolls
helpercenter14: Learn how to become a partner
helpercenter16: Learn how to configure the ticketing system correctly on your server
helpercenter19: Find answers to the top questions we receive from our users.
helpercenter21: By purchasing Premium you support development of Hope and unlock extra features to improve your overall experience. A list of key features can be found
helpercenter23: On how many servers can I use premium?
helpercenter24: Premium can only be used on one server. If you wish to unlock the premium features on multiple servers, you have to buy it again.
helpercenter25: Can I pay with another currency?
helpercenter26: Yes! At checkout, Paypal will tell you the transfer rate and how much premium costs in your currency. Everything happens automatically!
helpercenter27: Can I transfer my premium to another server?
helpercenter28: This is currently not possible. Please contact us if you accidentally purchased premium for a wrong server.
helpercenter29: How can I support development even more?
helpercenter30: There are a ton of ways you can help out! Things like boosting the support server and donations are greatly appreciated! You can apply for staff too! Join The support server for more information.
helpercenter31: When will my premium be activated?
helpercenter32: After payment, open a ticket on the support server or contact Klaus#1565.
